name: Branaverse
description: As to make it more exciting and a base for growth and expansion, this project includes a Freelance Platform, NFT Marketplace & Launchpad , Project to Earn . As freelancers when we offer our services in this field we get paid with crypto and we are aware through the experience of the malfunctioning that payment is not always guaranteed and thus many compromises crumble, we believe that a credible platform that will play the role of a mediator is the key to regulating this exchange between Offer/Demand
